text: beshak aakaashon tatha dharatee kee rachana mein, raat tatha din ke ek-doosare ke peechhe nirantar aane-jaane mein, un naavon mein, jo maanav ke laabh ke saadhanon ko lie, saagaron mein chalatee-phiratee hain aur varsha ke us paanee mein, jise allaah aakaash se barasaata hai, phir dharatee ko usake dvaara, usake maran (sookhane) ke pashchaat jeevit karata hai aur usamen pratyek jeevon ko phailaata hai tatha vaayuon ko pherane mein aur un baadalon mein, jo aakaash aur dharatee ke beech usakee aagya[1] ke adheen rahate hain, (in sab cheezon mein) aganit nishaaniyaan (lakshn) hain, un logon ke lie, jo samajh-boojh rakhate hain
